card.name: Armament Master
card.property: Other Kor creatures you control get +2/+2 for each Equipment attached to Armament Master.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We prepare for the known with daggers, rations, rope, and pitons. But we also prepare for the unknown with billycat tails, pikku roots, hedron chips . . ."

card.name: Arrow Volley Trap
card.property: If four or more creatures are attacking, you may pay {1}{W} rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Arrow Volley Trap deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of target attacking creatures.

card.name: Bold Defense
card.property: Kicker {3}{W} (You may pay an additional {3}{W} as you cast this spell.) Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, instead creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Brave the Elements
card.property: Choose a color. White creatures you control gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Trust me, your lost fingers and toes are nothing compared to the lost treasures of Sejiri." —Zahr Gada, Halimar expedition leader

card.name: Caravan Hurda
card.property: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Not too bright, but good enough for the job required—carrying and walking in a straight line." —Bruse Tarl, Goma Fada nomad

card.name: Celestial Mantle
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3. Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, double its controller's life total.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Upon such armor, even a mountain would break.

card.name: Cliff Threader
card.property: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The crossing demands singular focus. Your life consists of these ropes, these hooks, and these rocky crags. Your past is miles below."

card.name: Conqueror's Pledge
card.property: Kicker {6} (You may pay an additional {6} as you cast this spell.) Create six 1/1 white Kor Soldier creature tokens. If this spell was kicked, create twelve of those tokens instead.

card.name: Day of Judgment
card.property: Destroy all creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have seen planes leveled and all life rendered to dust. It brought no pleasure, even to a heart as dark as mine." —Sorin Markov

card.name: Devout Lightcaster
card.property: Protection from black When Devout Lightcaster enters the battlefield, exile target black permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Goddess, grant us light to banish the world's shadows." —Prayer to Kamsa

card.name: Emeria Angel
card.property: Flying Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the earth shudders, the sky overflows.

card.name: Felidar Sovereign
card.property: Vigilance, lifelink At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 40 or more life, you win the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If survival is a game, I've seen the winner." —Hazir, Sejiri cartographer

card.name: Iona, Shield of Emeria
card.property: Flying As Iona, Shield of Emeria enters the battlefield, choose a color. Your opponents can't cast spells of the chosen color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No more shall the righteous cower before evil.

card.name: Journey to Nowhere
card.property: When Journey to Nowhere enters the battlefield, exile target creature. When Journey to Nowhere leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Kabira Evangel
card.property: Whenever Kabira Evangel or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may choose a color. If you do, Allies you control gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn.

card.name: Kazandu Blademaster
card.property: First strike, vigilance Whenever Kazandu Blademaster or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Kazandu Blademaster.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you hire a sell-sword, you'd better watch your back. Hire me, and I'll watch it for you."

card.name: Kor Aeronaut
card.property: Kicker {1}{W} (You may pay an additional {1}{W} as you cast this spell.) Flying When Kor Aeronaut enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, target creature gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Kor Cartographer
card.property: When Kor Cartographer enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kor have no concept of exploration. They return to homelands forgotten.

card.name: Kor Duelist
card.property: As long as Kor Duelist is equipped, it has double strike. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Swords cannot reach far enough. Chains cannot strike hard enough. An eternal dilemma, but a simple one."

card.name: Kor Hookmaster
card.property: When Kor Hookmaster enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For us, a rope represents the ties that bind the kor. For you, it's more literal."

card.name: Kor Outfitter
card.property: When Kor Outfitter enters the battlefield, you may attach target Equipment you control to target creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We take only what we need to survive. Believe me, you will need this."

card.name: Kor Sanctifiers
card.property: Kicker {W} (You may pay an additional {W} as you cast this spell.) When Kor Sanctifiers enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why keep such trinkets? They only add weight to your travels."

card.name: Kor Skyfisher
card.property: Flying When Kor Skyfisher enters the battlefield, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sometimes I snare the unexpected, but I know its purpose will be revealed in time."

card.name: Landbind Ritual
card.property: You gain 2 life for each Plains you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Honor this place, for our children's children will stand here and speak these same words again." —Ayli, Kamsa cleric

card.name: Luminarch Ascension
card.property: At the beginning of each opponent's end step, if you didn't lose life this turn, you may put a quest counter on Luminarch Ascension. (Damage causes loss of life.) {1}{W}: Create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying. Activate this ability only if Luminarch Ascension has four or more quest counters on it.

card.name: Makindi Shieldmate
card.property: Defender Whenever Makindi Shieldmate or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Makindi Shieldmate.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The more who rely on him, the more resolute he becomes.

card.name: Narrow Escape
card.property: Return target permanent you control to its owner's hand. You gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A good explorer has to be as slippery as a gomazoa, as tough as a scute bug, and luckier than a ten-fingered trapfinder." —Arhana, Kazandu trapfinder

card.name: Nimbus Wings
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+2 and has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Explorers may find ways into the Sky Ruin, but they find its secrets well protected by shifting hedrons and Roil winds.

card.name: Noble Vestige
card.property: Flying {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target player or planeswalker this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Most spirits are chained to this world by their despair, but he remains tethered by his hope for better days.

card.name: Ondu Cleric
card.property: Whenever Ondu Cleric or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may gain life equal to the number of Allies you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A cleric's true balm is the confidence he inspires in his compatriots.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: These stubborn and unpredictable oxen inspire the plains nomads' most colorful curses.

card.name: Pitfall Trap
card.property: If exactly one creature is attacking, you may pay {W} rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Destroy target attacking creature without flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each spike is poisoned—the trapmaker's idea of mercy.

card.name: Quest for the Holy Relic
card.property: Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may put a quest counter on Quest for the Holy Relic. Remove five quest counters from Quest for the Holy Relic and sacrifice it: Search your library for an Equipment card, put it onto the battlefield, and attach it to a creature you control. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Shepherd of the Lost
card.property: Flying, first strike, vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Should you fall in the wilds, lift your voice to the Sky Realm. The one who answers will be your salvation." —Emeria's Creed

card.name: Shieldmate's Blessing
card.property: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even land dwellers may call for Emeria's grace in times of need." —Emeria's Creed

card.name: Steppe Lynx
card.property: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Steppe Lynx gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nothing quickens the predator's blood like the unfamiliar scents of new hunting grounds and the mewling cries of new prey.

card.name: Sunspring Expedition
card.property: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a quest counter on Sunspring Expedition. Remove three quest counters from Sunspring Expedition and sacrifice it: You gain 8 life.

card.name: Windborne Charge
card.property: Two target creatures you control each get +2/+2 and gain flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The merfolk call the sky goddess Emeria. The kor call her Kamsa. The two races agree on little except that she offers many blessings to the faithful.

card.name: World Queller
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may choose a card type. If you do, each player sacrifices a permanent of that type.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why fight the world when you know who will win?" —Nissa Revane

card.name: Aether Figment
card.property: Kicker {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell.) Aether Figment can't be blocked. If Aether Figment was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Archive Trap
card.property: If an opponent searched their library this turn, you may pay {0} rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Target opponent puts the top thirteen cards of their library into their graveyard.

card.name: Archmage Ascension
card.property: At the beginning of each end step, if you drew two or more cards this turn, you may put a quest counter on Archmage Ascension. As long as Archmage Ascension has six or more quest counters on it, if you would draw a card, you may instead search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Caller of Gales
card.property: {1} {U}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some merfolk choose to rest their fins in the water. I believe wisdom exists not only where we were born but where we were told not to go."

card.name: Cancel
card.property: Counter target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Zendikar's volatile mana is the basis for many spectacular spells—and some equally astonishing failures.

card.name: Cosi's Trickster
card.property: Whenever an opponent shuffles their library, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Cosi's Trickster.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She watches the chaos created by the Roil, seeking strength in the patterns of anarchy.

card.name: Gomazoa
card.property: Defender, flying {T}: Put Gomazoa and each creature it's blocking on top of their owners' libraries, then those players shuffle their libraries.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To explorers, "point man" is a polite way of saying "gomazoa fodder."

card.name: Hedron Crab
card.property: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, target player puts the top three cards of their library into their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hedrons perplex minds both great and small.

card.name: Into the Roil
card.property: Kicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} as you cast this spell.) Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If this spell was kicked, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Roil tide! Roil tide! Tie yourselves down!"

card.name: Ior Ruin Expedition
card.property: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a quest counter on Ior Ruin Expedition. Remove three quest counters from Ior Ruin Expedition and sacrifice it: Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A spike and a maul are needed to crack their shells, but the taste is worth the effort.

card.name: Lethargy Trap
card.property: If three or more creatures are attacking, you may pay {U} rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Attacking creatures get -3/-0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Suddenly, Zurdi didn't care about treasure, glory, food . . . or the drakes circling above.

card.name: Living Tsunami
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Living Tsunami unless you return a land you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At low tide it slumbers. At high tide it devours.

card.name: Lorthos, the Tidemaker
card.property: Whenever Lorthos, the Tidemaker attacks, you may pay {8}. If you do, tap up to eight target permanents. Those permanents don't untap during their controllers' next untap steps.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When Lorthos emerges from his deepwater realm, the tides bow to his will and the coastline cowers in his presence.

card.name: Lullmage Mentor
card.property: Whenever a spell or ability you control counters a spell, you may create a 1/1 blue Merfolk creature token. Tap seven untapped Merfolk you control: Counter target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Many voices are needed to quiet this land."

card.name: Merfolk Seastalkers
card.property: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) {2}{U}: Tap target creature without flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do they seek knowledge or wealth? Are they bandits or benefactors? It depends on who is chanting the tale." —Nikou, Joraga bard

card.name: Merfolk Wayfinder
card.property: Flying When Merfolk Wayfinder enters the battlefield, reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all Island cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Mindbreak Trap
card.property: If an opponent cast three or more spells this turn, you may pay {0} rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Exile any number of target spells.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Life is a maze. This is one of its dead ends." —Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

card.name: Paralyzing Grasp
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Halimar Sea Caves are both the breeding ground of giant squids and the dumping ground of hardened criminals.

card.name: Quest for Ancient Secrets
card.property: Whenever a card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, you may put a quest counter on Quest for Ancient Secrets. Remove five quest counters from Quest for Ancient Secrets and sacrifice it: Target player shuffles their graveyard into their library.

card.name: Reckless Scholar
card.property: {T}: Target player draws a card, then discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Any good prospector must sift the gold from the sand."

card.name: Rite of Replication
card.property: Kicker {5} (You may pay an additional {5} as you cast this spell.) Create a token that's a copy of target creature. If this spell was kicked, create five of those tokens instead.

card.name: Roil Elemental
card.property: Flying Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may gain control of target creature for as long as you control Roil Elemental.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A vortex that devours everything—even the souls of the living.

card.name: Sea Gate Loremaster
card.property: {T}: Draw a card for each Ally you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He's a living library. He remembers everything our band of explorers has seen, and we can use that to our advantage." —Zahr Gada, Halimar expedition leader

card.name: Seascape Aerialist
card.property: Whenever Seascape Aerialist or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Ally creatures you control gain flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The sky is like another sea. It teems with currents, life, and endless possibility."

card.name: Shoal Serpent
card.property: Defender Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Shoal Serpent loses defender until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's like a reef that runs aground on ships." —Jaby, Silundi Sea nomad

card.name: Sky Ruin Drake
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hold up your spears. And try not to look like food." —Tarsa, Sea Gate sell-sword

card.name: Spell Pierce
card.property: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's a hole in your plan." —Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

card.name: Sphinx of Jwar Isle
card.property: Flying Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.) You may look at the top card of your library any time.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even if the sphinxes do know the location of every relic, getting one to talk is harder than just searching yourself." —Sachir, Akoum Expeditionary House

card.name: Sphinx of Lost Truths
card.property: Kicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} as you cast this spell.) Flying When Sphinx of Lost Truths enters the battlefield, draw three cards. Then if it wasn't kicked, discard three cards.

card.name: Spreading Seas
card.property: Enchant land When Spreading Seas enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted land is an Island.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Most inhabitants of Zendikar have given up on the idea of an accurate map.

card.name: Summoner's Bane
card.property: Counter target creature spell. Create a 2/2 blue Illusion creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I don't need to have the perfect plan. My foe just has to have an imperfect one." —Jace Beleren

card.name: Tempest Owl
card.property: Kicker {4}{U} (You may pay an additional {4}{U} as you cast this spell.) Flying When Tempest Owl enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, tap up to three target permanents.

card.name: Trapfinder's Trick
card.property: Target player reveals their hand and discards all Trap cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "At some point, every trapfinder will lose a hunk of flesh. It's just a question of how much—and whether it'll grow back." —Arhana, Kazandu trapfinder

card.name: Trapmaker's Snare
card.property: Search your library for a Trap card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Trapmaking is an art. The trap is a corporeal riddle, a battle of wits between its creator and whatever it lures inside."

card.name: Umara Raptor
card.property: Flying Whenever Umara Raptor or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Umara Raptor.

card.name: Welkin Tern
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Welkin Tern can block only creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The sky hedrons are covered with tern nests. It's as though the birds have given up on the land altogether." —Ilori, merfolk falconer

card.name: Whiplash Trap
card.property: If an opponent had two or more creatures enter the battlefield under their control this turn, you may pay {U} rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Return two target creatures to their owners' hands.

card.name: Windrider Eel
card.property: Flying Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Windrider Eel gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The best spot to hook one is right behind the gills." —Rana Cloudwake, kor skyfisher

card.name: Bala Ged Thief
card.property: Whenever Bala Ged Thief or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, target player reveals a number of cards from their hand equal to the number of Allies you control. You choose one of them. That player discards that card.

card.name: Blood Seeker
card.property: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, you may have that player lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A drop now is all he needs to find you later.

card.name: Blood Tribute
card.property: Kicker—Tap an untapped Vampire you control. (You may tap a Vampire you control in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.) Target opponent loses half their life, rounded up. If this spell was kicked, you gain life equal to the life lost this way.

card.name: Bloodchief Ascension
card.property: At the beginning of each end step, if an opponent lost 2 or more life this turn, you may put a quest counter on Bloodchief Ascension. (Damage causes loss of life.) Whenever a card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, if Bloodchief Ascension has three or more quest counters on it, you may have that player lose 2 life. If you do, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Bloodghast
card.property: Bloodghast can't block. Bloodghast has haste as long as an opponent has 10 or less life. Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may return Bloodghast from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Bog Tatters
card.property: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A wraith is a tale of brutal slaying told anew whenever it finds a victim.

card.name: Crypt Ripper
card.property: Haste {B}: Crypt Ripper gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The tender light of the living quickens the pulse of the dead.

card.name: Desecrated Earth
card.property: Destroy target land. Its controller discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The land is swollen with mana, cursed relics, and secrets. If you puncture it, you never know what will burst out." —Javad Nasrin, Ondu relic hunter

card.name: Disfigure
card.property: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Brave scar or unfortunate tale? It all depends on your pain threshold."

card.name: Feast of Blood
card.property: Cast this spell only if you control two or more Vampires. Destroy target creature. You gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The vampires of this world don't know the pleasures of hunger. They gorge themselves without savoring the kill." —Sorin Markov

card.name: Gatekeeper of Malakir
card.property: Kicker {B} (You may pay an additional {B} as you cast this spell.) When Gatekeeper of Malakir enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, target player sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You may enter the city—once the toll is paid."

card.name: Giant Scorpion
card.property: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its sting hurts, but death is strangely painless.

card.name: Grim Discovery
card.property: Choose one or both — • Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. • Return target land card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Few among the living understand just how much of their world is shaped by the ruins of the dead.

card.name: Guul Draz Specter
card.property: Flying Guul Draz Specter gets +3/+3 as long as an opponent has no cards in hand. Whenever Guul Draz Specter deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.

card.name: Guul Draz Vampire
card.property: As long as an opponent has 10 or less life, Guul Draz Vampire gets +2/+1 and has intimidate. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A creature's bloodscent is a beacon that cannot be disguised."

card.name: Hagra Crocodile
card.property: Hagra Crocodile can't block. Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Hagra Crocodile gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The creatures of Zendikar are opportunists, eating whatever is available to them. Like goblins. Or boats.

card.name: Hagra Diabolist
card.property: Whenever Hagra Diabolist or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may have target player lose life equal to the number of Allies you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When exploring the darkest regions, wickedness can be the best accomplice of all."

card.name: Halo Hunter
card.property: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.) When Halo Hunter enters the battlefield, destroy target Angel.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hanging on the walls of his lair, the fallen halos cast his depravity in everlasting light.

card.name: Heartstabber Mosquito
card.property: Kicker {2}{B} (You may pay an additional {2}{B} as you cast this spell.) Flying When Heartstabber Mosquito enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, destroy target creature.

card.name: Hideous End
card.property: Destroy target nonblack creature. Its controller loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A little dark magic won't stop me. The worse the curse, the better the prize." —Radavi, Joraga relic hunter, last words

card.name: Kalitas, Bloodchief of Ghet
Malakir Bloodwitch
card.property: Flying, protection from white When Malakir Bloodwitch enters the battlefield, each opponent loses life equal to the number of Vampires you control. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

card.name: Marsh Casualties
card.property: Kicker {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell.) Creatures target player controls get -1/-1 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, those creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn instead.

card.name: Mind Sludge
card.property: Target player discards a card for each Swamp you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Guard your thoughts. You never know who might wish to take them from you." —Kalitas, Bloodchief of Ghet

card.name: Mindless Null
card.property: Mindless Null can't block unless you control a Vampire.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only a bloodchief can create vampires. The rest sire nulls, who become mindless beasts in their former bodies.

card.name: Mire Blight
card.property: Enchant creature When enchanted creature is dealt damage, destroy it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Is there anything in Guul Draz that doesn't suck the life out of you?" —Tarsa, Sea Gate sell-sword

card.name: Needlebite Trap
card.property: If an opponent gained life this turn, you may pay {B} rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Target player loses 5 life and you gain 5 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The traps around the vampire city of Malakir hint at the thirst of its inhabitants.

card.name: Nimana Sell-Sword
card.property: Whenever Nimana Sell-Sword or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Nimana Sell-Sword.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He asked if I had work for him. No wasn't the right answer." —Samila, Murasa Expeditionary House

card.name: Ob Nixilis, the Fallen
card.property: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may have target player lose 3 life. If you do, put three +1/+1 counters on Ob Nixilis, the Fallen.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His spark lost, he plots revenge upon the plane whose corrupting mana fractured his soul.

card.name: Quest for the Gravelord
card.property: Whenever a creature dies, you may put a quest counter on Quest for the Gravelord. Remove three quest counters from Quest for the Gravelord and sacrifice it: Create a 5/5 black Zombie Giant creature token.

card.name: Ravenous Trap
card.property: If an opponent had three or more cards put into their graveyard from anywhere this turn, you may pay {0} rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Exile all cards from target player's graveyard.

card.name: Sadistic Sacrament
card.property: Kicker {7} (You may pay an additional {7} as you cast this spell.) Search target player's library for up to three cards, exile them, then that player shuffles their library. If this spell was kicked, instead search that player's library for up to fifteen cards, exile them, then that player shuffles their library.

card.name: Sorin Markov
card.property: +2: Sorin Markov deals 2 damage to any target and you gain 2 life. −3: Target opponent's life total becomes 10. −7: You control target player during that player's next turn.

card.name: Soul Stair Expedition
card.property: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a quest counter on Soul Stair Expedition. Remove three quest counters from Soul Stair Expedition and sacrifice it: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Surrakar Marauder
card.property: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Surrakar Marauder gains intimidate until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)

card.name: Vampire Hexmage
card.property: First strike Sacrifice Vampire Hexmage: Remove all counters from target permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the blood hunt lost its thrill, she looked for less tangible means of domination.

card.name: Vampire Lacerator
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life unless an opponent has 10 or less life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The lacerators cut themselves before each hunt. They must feed before the sun rises or bleed to death.

card.name: Vampire Nighthawk
card.property: Flying, deathtouch, lifelink

card.name: Vampire's Bite
card.property: Kicker {2}{B} (You may pay an additional {2}{B} as you cast this spell.) Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, that creature gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

card.name: Bladetusk Boar
card.property: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who dare stand in its path are either brave or mindless. Or in the case of goblins, both.

card.name: Burst Lightning
card.property: Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.) Burst Lightning deals 2 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, it deals 4 damage instead.

card.name: Chandra Ablaze
card.property: +1: Discard a card. If a red card is discarded this way, Chandra Ablaze deals 4 damage to any target. −2: Each player discards their hand, then draws three cards. −7: Cast any number of red instant and/or sorcery cards from your graveyard without paying their mana costs.

card.name: Demolish
card.property: Destroy target artifact or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This is why I hate settlements. They lull you into a false sense of security." —Yon Basrel, Oran-Rief survivalist

card.name: Electropotence
card.property: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, that creature deals damage equal to its power to any target.

card.name: Elemental Appeal
card.property: Kicker {5} (You may pay an additional {5} as you cast this spell.) Create a 7/1 red Elemental creature token with trample and haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step. If this spell was kicked, that creature gets +7/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Geyser Glider
card.property: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Geyser Glider gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Quit pontificating, mage. The last thing we want to do is give it more hot air." —Tala Vertan, Makindi shieldmate

card.name: Goblin Bushwhacker
card.property: Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.) When Goblin Bushwhacker enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain haste until end of turn.

card.name: Goblin Guide
card.property: Haste Whenever Goblin Guide attacks, defending player reveals the top card of their library. If it's a land card, that player puts it into their hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've been all over this world. I even remember some of those places."

card.name: Goblin Ruinblaster
card.property: Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.) Haste When Goblin Ruinblaster enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, destroy target nonbasic land.

card.name: Goblin Shortcutter
card.property: When Goblin Shortcutter enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Goblins are cheap, but be careful. It's a lot easier to steal from a corpse than a customer." —Samila, Murasa Expeditionary House

card.name: Goblin War Paint
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: War paint made from kolya fruit heightens senses and lessens fear. Unfortunately, fear is usually what keeps you alive.

card.name: Hellfire Mongrel
card.property: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has two or fewer cards in hand, Hellfire Mongrel deals 2 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is no fondness between the hound and its master. There is only a common appreciation of the hunt.

card.name: Hellkite Charger
card.property: Flying, haste Whenever Hellkite Charger attacks, you may pay {5}{R}{R}. If you do, untap all attacking creatures and after this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

card.name: Highland Berserker
card.property: Whenever Highland Berserker or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Ally creatures you control gain first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He gets paid by the axe.

card.name: Inferno Trap
card.property: If you've been dealt damage by two or more creatures this turn, you may pay {R} rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Inferno Trap deals 4 damage to target creature.

card.name: Kazuul Warlord
card.property: Whenever Kazuul Warlord or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on each Ally creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On expeditions, minotaurs are worth their weight in gold. Fortunately for their paymasters, most minotaurs don't know how much they weigh.

card.name: Lavaball Trap
card.property: If an opponent had two or more lands enter the battlefield under their control this turn, you may pay {3}{R}{R} rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Destroy two target lands. Lavaball Trap deals 4 damage to each creature.

card.name: Magma Rift
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a land. Magma Rift deals 5 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Lighting a fire needs kindling and heat. You be the kindling. I'll bring the heat." —Chandra Nalaar

card.name: Mark of Mutiny
card.property: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on it and untap it. That creature gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The flame of anger is hard to douse once lit.

card.name: Molten Ravager
card.property: {R}: Molten Ravager gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only the foolhardy would venture into the Akoum Mountains without a lullmage to tame the raging rocks and living fires." —Sachir, Akoum Expeditionary House

card.name: Murasa Pyromancer
card.property: Whenever Murasa Pyromancer or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Murasa Pyromancer deal damage to target creature equal to the number of Allies you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fire is my accomplice. For enough coin, it can be yours as well."

card.name: Obsidian Fireheart
Plated Geopede
card.property: First strike Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Plated Geopede gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Kor armorers buy the scales and claws. Elf oracles buy the rest." —Nablus, North Hada trapper

card.name: Punishing Fire
card.property: Punishing Fire deals 2 damage to any target. Whenever an opponent gains life, you may pay {R}. If you do, return Punishing Fire from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Pyromancer Ascension
card.property: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell that has the same name as a card in your graveyard, you may put a quest counter on Pyromancer Ascension. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell while Pyromancer Ascension has two or more quest counters on it, you may copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Quest for Pure Flame
card.property: Whenever a source you control deals damage to an opponent, you may put a quest counter on Quest for Pure Flame. Remove four quest counters from Quest for Pure Flame and sacrifice it: If any source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player this turn, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead.

card.name: Ruinous Minotaur
card.property: Whenever Ruinous Minotaur deals damage to an opponent, sacrifice a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not every intelligent being is interested in treasure and lost knowledge . . . or even the basics of speech.

card.name: Runeflare Trap
card.property: If an opponent drew three or more cards this turn, you may pay {R} rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Runeflare Trap deals damage to target player equal to the number of cards in that player's hand.

card.name: Seismic Shudder
card.property: Seismic Shudder deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The land here seems to go out of its way to kill you." —Chandra Nalaar

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Now I know why they call it Shatterskull Pass. Rocks fell all night like hammers smashing an anvil. It's no wonder the giants are angry all the time." —Mitra, Bala Ged missionary

card.name: Slaughter Cry
card.property: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Since when did 'AIIIEEEE!' become a negotiation tactic?" —Nikou, Joraga bard

card.name: Spire Barrage
card.property: Spire Barrage deals damage to any target equal to the number of Mountains you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Goblin lessons include the 2,071 tips for survival. Frek only remembered 2,070.

card.name: Torch Slinger
card.property: Kicker {1}{R} (You may pay an additional {1}{R} as you cast this spell.) When Torch Slinger enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, it deals 2 damage to target creature.

card.name: Tuktuk Grunts
card.property: Haste Whenever Tuktuk Grunts or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Tuktuk Grunts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Goblins are more aggressive with a crowd to cheer them on.

card.name: Unstable Footing
card.property: Kicker {3}{R} (You may pay an additional {3}{R} as you cast this spell.) Damage can't be prevented this turn. If this spell was kicked, it deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A long way down is shorter than you think.

card.name: Warren Instigator
card.property: Double strike Whenever Warren Instigator deals damage to an opponent, you may put a Goblin creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Danger! Danger! Come out of the safety of your holes!"

card.name: Zektar Shrine Expedition
card.property: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a quest counter on Zektar Shrine Expedition. Remove three quest counters from Zektar Shrine Expedition and sacrifice it: Create a 7/1 red Elemental creature token with trample and haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Baloth Cage Trap
card.property: If an opponent had an artifact enter the battlefield under their control this turn, you may pay {1}{G} rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Create a 4/4 green Beast creature token.

card.name: Baloth Woodcrasher
card.property: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Baloth Woodcrasher gets +4/+4 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its insatiable hunger quickly depletes a region of prey. It must migrate from place to place to feed its massive bulk.

card.name: Beast Hunt
card.property: Reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all creature cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Surely we could tame something besides hurdas and pillarfield oxen!" —Sheyda, Ondu gamekeeper

card.name: Beastmaster Ascension
card.property: Whenever a creature you control attacks, you may put a quest counter on Beastmaster Ascension. As long as Beastmaster Ascension has seven or more quest counters on it, creatures you control get +5/+5.

card.name: Cobra Trap
card.property: If a noncreature permanent under your control was destroyed this turn by a spell or ability an opponent controlled, you may pay {G} rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Create four 1/1 green Snake creature tokens.

card.name: Frontier Guide
card.property: {3} {G}, {T}: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The elders say Zendikar has no safe, peaceful places. How would they know? They've never looked."

card.name: Gigantiform
card.property: Kicker {4} Enchant creature Enchanted creature has base power and toughness 8/8 and has trample. When Gigantiform enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, you may search your library for a card named Gigantiform, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Grazing Gladehart
card.property: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't be fooled. If it were as docile as it looks, it would've died off long ago." —Yon Basrel, Oran-Rief survivalist

card.name: Greenweaver Druid
card.property: {T}: Add {G}{G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The other tribes call them fanatics, but none deny that the Mul Daya elves have an iron-strong bond to some force greater than themselves.

card.name: Harrow
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a land. Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Roil redraws the world as it passes, leaving only the hedrons unchanged.

card.name: Joraga Bard
card.property: Whenever Joraga Bard or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Ally creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Adventuring bards recite Chanter's Epics, never-ending tales that keep their comrades' minds alert to danger.

card.name: Khalni Heart Expedition
card.property: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a quest counter on Khalni Heart Expedition. Remove three quest counters from Khalni Heart Expedition and sacrifice it: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Lotus Cobra
card.property: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its scales contain the essence of thousands of lotus blooms.

card.name: Mold Shambler
card.property: Kicker {1}{G} (You may pay an additional {1}{G} as you cast this spell.) When Mold Shambler enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, destroy target noncreature permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When civilization encroaches on nature, Zendikar encroaches back.

card.name: Nissa Revane
card.property: +1: Search your library for a card named Nissa's Chosen and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library. +1: You gain 2 life for each Elf you control. −7: Search your library for any number of Elf creature cards and put them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Nissa's Chosen
card.property: If Nissa's Chosen would die, put it on the bottom of its owner's library instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nissa will save the elves, but only the ones who have proved their worth."

card.name: Oracle of Mul Daya
card.property: You may play an additional land on each of your turns. Play with the top card of your library revealed. You may play lands from the top of your library.

card.name: Oran-Rief Recluse
card.property: Kicker {2}{G} (You may pay an additional {2}{G} as you cast this spell.) Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) When Oran-Rief Recluse enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, destroy target creature with flying.

card.name: Oran-Rief Survivalist
card.property: Whenever Oran-Rief Survivalist or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Oran-Rief Survivalist.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'm strong enough to survive alone. I'm smart enough to want companions at my side."

card.name: Predatory Urge
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals damage equal to its power to target creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power to this creature."

card.name: Primal Bellow
card.property: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each Forest you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A might spell can be handy against baloths, giants, kraken, the Roil—or if you lose your bearings in the woods."—Chadir the Navigator

card.name: Quest for the Gemblades
card.property: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a creature, you may put a quest counter on Quest for the Gemblades. Remove a quest counter from Quest for the Gemblades and sacrifice it: Put four +1/+1 counters on target creature.

card.name: Rampaging Baloths
card.property: Trample Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may create a 4/4 green Beast creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the land is angry, so are they." —Nissa Revane

card.name: Relic Crush
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment and up to one other target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There are many ruins, but there used to be many more.

card.name: River Boa
card.property: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) {G}: Regenerate River Boa.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sheath your swords! Cudgels only. I see a new pair of waterproof trek boots slithering away." —Nablus, North Hada trapper

card.name: Savage Silhouette
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has "{1}{G}: Regenerate this creature."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some elves believe that their survival instincts are born of many cycles of reincarnation.

card.name: Scute Mob
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control five or more lands, put four +1/+1 counters on Scute Mob.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Survival rule 781: There are always more scute bugs." —Zurdi, goblin shortcutter

card.name: Scythe Tiger
card.property: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.) When Scythe Tiger enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Instead of adapting to its environment, it adapts its environment to itself.

card.name: Summoning Trap
card.property: If a creature spell you cast this turn was countered by a spell or ability an opponent controlled, you may pay {0} rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Look at the top seven cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Tajuru Archer
card.property: Whenever Tajuru Archer or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Tajuru Archer deal damage to target creature with flying equal to the number of Allies you control.

card.name: Tanglesap
card.property: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by creatures without trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The blood of the forest is beholden to no one." —Nissa Revane

card.name: Terra Stomper
card.property: This spell can't be countered. Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes violent earthquakes, hurtling boulders, and unseasonable dust storms are wrongly attributed to the Roil.

card.name: Territorial Baloth
card.property: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Territorial Baloth gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its territory is defined by wherever it is at the moment.

card.name: Timbermaw Larva
card.property: Whenever Timbermaw Larva attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each Forest you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You can't trust your eyes. A tree might look healthy, but its insides tell a different tale." —Zahr Gada, Halimar expedition leader

card.name: Turntimber Basilisk
card.property: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may have target creature block Turntimber Basilisk this turn if able.

card.name: Turntimber Ranger
card.property: Whenever Turntimber Ranger or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Turntimber Ranger.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've known true ferocity and power. Those brazen 'planar-walkers' have no idea what wild really means." —Chadir the Navigator

card.name: Vines of Vastwood
card.property: Kicker {G} (You may pay an additional {G} as you cast this spell.) Target creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control this turn. If this spell was kicked, that creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

card.name: Zendikar Farguide
card.property: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Expeditions follow the paths it leaves in its wake.

card.name: Adventuring Gear
card.property: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, equipped creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An explorer's essentials in a wild world.

card.name: Blade of the Bloodchief
card.property: Whenever a creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on equipped creature. If equipped creature is a Vampire, put two +1/+1 counters on it instead. Equip {1}

card.name: Blazing Torch
card.property: Equipped creature can't be blocked by Vampires or Zombies. Equipped creature has "{T}, Sacrifice Blazing Torch: Blazing Torch deals 2 damage to any target." Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Carnage Altar
card.property: {3}, Sacrifice a creature: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In these bloodstains I will find the fingerprints of our oppressors." —Anowon, the Ruin Sage

card.name: Eldrazi Monument
card.property: Creatures you control get +1/+1 and have flying and indestructible. At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature. If you can't, sacrifice Eldrazi Monument.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Gods don't die. They merely slumber." —Ayli, Kamsa cleric

card.name: Eternity Vessel
card.property: Eternity Vessel enters the battlefield with X charge counters on it, where X is your life total. Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may have your life total become the number of charge counters on Eternity Vessel.

card.name: Expedition Map
card.property: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Expedition Map: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I use maps to find out where explorers have already been. Then I go the other way." —Javad Nasrin, Ondu relic hunter

card.name: Explorer's Scope
card.property: Whenever equipped creature attacks, look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield tapped. Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Grappling Hook

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Part tool, part weapon, part of the kor.

card.name: Hedron Scrabbler
card.property: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Hedron Scrabbler gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I don't care when the hedrons awoke. Why is the question that really matters." —Anowon, the Ruin Sage

card.name: Khalni Gem
card.property: When Khalni Gem enters the battlefield, return two lands you control to their owner's hand. {T}: Add two mana of any one color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A fragment of ancient power lost in the heart of Ora Ondar.

card.name: Spidersilk Net
card.property: Equipped creature gets +0/+2 and has reach. (It can block creatures with flying.) Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We suffer uneasy ground, unstable alliances, and unpredictable magic. Something you can truly trust is worth more than a chest of gold." —Nikou, Joraga bard

card.name: Trailblazer's Boots
card.property: Equipped creature has nonbasic landwalk. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a nonbasic land.) Equip {2}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's much easier to list the places they haven't been.

card.name: Trusty Machete
card.property: Equipped creature gets +2/+1. Equip {2}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Until this expedition is done, that blade is your guardian, your liberator, and your best friend all rolled into one."—Yon Basrel, Oran-Rief survivalist

card.name: Akoum Refuge
card.property: Akoum Refuge enters the battlefield tapped. When Akoum Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {B} or {R}.

card.name: Arid Mesa
card.property: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Arid Mesa: Search your library for a Mountain or Plains card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Crypt of Agadeem
card.property: Crypt of Agadeem enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B}. {2}, {T}: Add {B} for each black creature card in your graveyard.

card.name: Emeria, the Sky Ruin
card.property: Emeria, the Sky Ruin enters the battlefield tapped. At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control seven or more Plains, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. {T}: Add {W}.

card.name: Graypelt Refuge
card.property: Graypelt Refuge enters the battlefield tapped. When Graypelt Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {G} or {W}.

card.name: Jwar Isle Refuge
card.property: Jwar Isle Refuge enters the battlefield tapped. When Jwar Isle Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {U} or {B}.

card.name: Kabira Crossroads
card.property: Kabira Crossroads enters the battlefield tapped. When Kabira Crossroads enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life. {T}: Add {W}.

card.name: Kazandu Refuge
card.property: Kazandu Refuge enters the battlefield tapped. When Kazandu Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {R} or {G}.

card.name: Magosi, the Waterveil
card.property: Magosi, the Waterveil enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U}. {U}, {T}: Put an eon counter on Magosi, the Waterveil. Skip your next turn. {T}, Remove an eon counter from Magosi, the Waterveil and return it to its owner's hand: Take an extra turn after this one.

card.name: Marsh Flats
card.property: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Marsh Flats: Search your library for a Plains or Swamp card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Misty Rainforest
card.property: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Misty Rainforest: Search your library for a Forest or Island card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Oran-Rief, the Vastwood
card.property: Oran-Rief, the Vastwood enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G}. {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each green creature that entered the battlefield this turn.

card.name: Piranha Marsh
card.property: Piranha Marsh enters the battlefield tapped. When Piranha Marsh enters the battlefield, target player loses 1 life. {T}: Add {B}.

card.name: Scalding Tarn
card.property: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Scalding Tarn: Search your library for an Island or Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Sejiri Refuge
card.property: Sejiri Refuge enters the battlefield tapped. When Sejiri Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

card.name: Soaring Seacliff
card.property: Soaring Seacliff enters the battlefield tapped. When Soaring Seacliff enters the battlefield, target creature gains flying until end of turn. {T}: Add {U}.

card.name: Teetering Peaks
card.property: Teetering Peaks enters the battlefield tapped. When Teetering Peaks enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. {T}: Add {R}.

card.name: Turntimber Grove
card.property: Turntimber Grove enters the battlefield tapped. When Turntimber Grove enters the battlefield, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. {T}: Add {G}.

card.name: Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle
card.property: Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle enters the battlefield tapped. Whenever a Mountain enters the battlefield under your control, if you control at least five other Mountains, you may have Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle deal 3 damage to any target. {T}: Add {R}.

card.name: Verdant Catacombs
card.property: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Verdant Catacombs: Search your library for a Swamp or Forest card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.
